sentence.Network_en: Woe betide anyone who got in his way.
Woe betide you if you betray us.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你背叛我们,你会得到报应.

sentence.Network_en: Whatever may betide, maintain your courage.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论发生什么事,都不要惊慌失措.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语九级词汇_百度文库 ... beseem vt.vi. 适合于 betide vt. 发生于 bevel n. 斜角,倾斜,斜角规.
... 1.exclusive a. 排外的；独占的；唯一的；完整的 2.betide v. 发生；降临于 3.garish a. 过分装饰的；炫耀的；俗气的；耀眼的.
Woe be to ... = Woe betide ., 愿遭殃 , 愿灾难降临到身上.

list.abs: Woe betide the poor soldier ., 不幸降临于可怜的士兵身上.
Woe betide you if you betray us ., 如果你背叛我们 , 你会得到报应.
woe betide you if you betray us .如果你背叛我们，你会得到报应。
Mournful that no new wonder may betide ., 哀叹没有新的奇迹会降临.
We shall remain friends whatever betide ., 无论发生什么事 , 我们将永远是朋友.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from be- (as an intensifier)+ obsolete tide 'befall', from Old English  tīdan 'happen', from tīd (see tide)

entry.def: If you say woe betide anyone who does a particular thing, you mean that something unpleasant will happen to them if they do it.

example.ex: Woe betide anyone who got in his way.

sentences.sentence: "He promised that no harm would befall her"

auth_sentence.content: Woe betide the first person who throws his Coke against a wall.
auth_sentence.res_content: Woe betide the first person who throws his Coke against a wall.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Woe betide the first person who throws his Coke against a wall.

auth_sentence.content: Woe betide any pundit who appears in the same outfit for two consecutive matches.
auth_sentence.res_content: Woe betide any pundit who appears in the same outfit for two consecutive matches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Woe betide any pundit who appears in the same outfit for two consecutive matches.

auth_sentence.content: Took that child so fair From his weak arms, that ill might not betide him Or her.
auth_sentence.res_content: Took that child so fair From his weak arms, that ill might not betide him Or her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Took that child so fair From his weak arms, that ill might not betide him Or her.
